author: enridaga
msg: Fixed path of the jobs service in the reasoners services output (STANBOL-343)

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-2299 Consolidate utility methods in AuthUtil and constants in AuthConstants and adapt uses. Existing methods (mostly in AbstractAuthenticationHandler) are deprecated but remain implemented calling the new AuthUtil methods. The SlingAuthentication.isBrowserRequest (which was wrong) is also replaced by the AuthUtil.isBrowserRequest method (analyzing the User-Agent).

author: enridaga
